page.title: 17CLUBS IN BROUGH
page.content: THERE IS A CLUB AT ALLINSONS GARAGE CALLED THE {GRAND PRIX CLUB.}IT IS ON A FRIDAY AND SATURDAY NIGHT.IT STARTS AT 9.PM AND FINISHES AT 2.AM.THERE ARE {SQUASH COURTS}WHICH ARE OPEN ALL THE TIME. THERE IS A{YOUTH CLUB}AT THE MEMORIAL HALL.THERE IS AN{ART CLASS}EVERY SATURDAY MORNING AT SCHOOL FROM 10.AM TILL 12 OCLOCK.THERE IS A{SNOOKER TOURNAMENT FOR CHILDREN EVERY MONTH. THERE IS {BINGO}ON FRIDAY NIGHT.THERE IS AN{OVER SIXTIES}CLUB ON WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON. THERE ARE {BROWNIES AND GUIDES}ON MONDAY NIGHTS.THERE IS A {FOOTBALL CLUB. THE {KEEP FIT }CLUB IS AT THE CASTLE HOTEL WHERE THE WEEKLY {DISCO}IS ALSO HELD. THE AMENITIES ARE GOING TO MAKE A { {B.M.X.}TRACK.
